title: core-binding
description: The base properties used in all top-level types

_type.description: Hardcoded value to indicate what type of construct this is

_id.description: Globally Unique Identifier for this construct. MUST be a UUIDv4.

timestamp.description: Time at which this construct was created. MUST be a UTC time.

source.description: The source of this ID, i.e. name of an external system
